text: It's About Time is the second studio album by American singer Christina Milian. It has more of a pop, hip hop and R&B; feel to it than her 2001 self- titled debut album. ==Track listing== Credits adapted from the liner notes of It's About Time. ==Charts== Chart Peak position Japan Oricon Album Chart 11 Dutch Albums Chart 66 French Albums Chart 83 German Albums Chart 55 Swiss Albums Chart 35 Ireland Albums Chart 74 UK Albums Chart 21 US Billboard 100 14 U.S. Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 5 ==References== Category:2004 albums Category:Christina Milian albums Category:Pop albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:R&B; albums
title: It's About Time (Christina Milian album)
